citation: Proclamation under the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 22 of the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 declare that â€“

        (a) the proclamation made under the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 (SR 1996, No. 191) is revoked; and
        (b) the proclamation made under the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 (SR 1999, No. 162) is revoked.
20 October 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MARK SHELTON

Minister for Local Government

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 October 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
